name: papermerge
description: Papermerge is a document management system designed to scan, classify, and OCR documents, storing them in a searchable, organized structure with tagging and export support.
features: OCR processing: Automatic optical character recognition converts scanned documents and images into searchable, selectable text
Document classification: Organize documents into folders and categories with hierarchical structure for logical filing
Tag management: Apply multiple tags to documents for flexible categorization and cross-referencing across different schemes
Full-text search: Search across all document content including OCR-extracted text to quickly locate specific information
Document viewer: Built-in PDF and image viewer with zoom, rotation, and page navigation for reviewing without downloads
Metadata extraction: Automatically extract and index document metadata including dates, titles, and custom fields
Export options: Download documents individually or in bulk with original formatting preserved for external use or backup
User permissions: Control document access with user-level permissions to secure sensitive information in multi-user environments
Version history: Track document changes over time and restore previous versions when needed for audit trails or error recovery
